provisions.content:

standards, health checks must be based on faecal bacteria counts.

reference standards.

accepted reference standards.

checks or to amend the parameters specified in these provisions for the purpose of protecting
public health, such measures must be adopted in accordance with the procedure referred to in
internationally accepted reference standards.
